name: Stuffed Pepperoncini
author: VALLY
summary: If you bring this dish to a party, make sure you bring the recipe with you, because everyone will want it after eating these.
ingredients: 6 slices bacon, cut into small pieces
directions: In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until bacon is browned
In drippings, cook shallots and red pepper over medium heat until vegetables are tender
Remove skillet from heat and let cool for 20 minutes
In a small bowl, beat cream cheese and milk with an electric mixer at medium speed until smooth
Stir bacon and shallot into the mixture
Spoon cream cheese mixture into a heavy weight plastic bag
Cut a small hole in one corner to squeeze the filling from
With small knife, cut a slit lengthwise into each pepper
Do not cut the whole way through the pepper
By squeezing the bag, pipe cream cheese mixture into peppers
Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, up to one day
